product.title: Thumper | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Thumper

Thumper’s outgoing personality and woodland antics have captivated the imaginations of young readers since 1942. In this classic tale, Thumper, Bambi, and Flower revel in the wonders of the forest, making new friends and discovering hidden dangers high above the hills. Colorfully illustrated pages and a whimsical storyline provide children with an enchanted view of forest habitats.

Tie-in Activity: Embark on a nature walk with your child, encouraging her to point out the insects, birds, and animals that she sees along the way. During your walk, look for sources of food, shelter, and water for the forest animals.
